content:
Identify the skill for the following utterance. Use the list of skills IDs and their descriptions provided above. 
If no skill matches the provided input, respond as {"skills":[]}
Extract any matching slots from the utterance for the the selected intent. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.   If a slot  value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".
Provide your response in JSON format as below:
{"skills":[{"UUID": "<id>", "slots":[]}]}
For the slots, use only their ids when responding. Do not use their descriptions.

### input:
Can you give me steps on how to upgrade the current OS on my notebook to Windows 11?
